title: (x) Condensed bold sans on vintage Nabokov book cover - Franklin Gothic XCond {Michel Boyer}
content:
Think I've ruled out the obvious things. Can't find an UC G and R like these in the same font. Any ideas please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019134642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nabokov_4543.jpg)
author: jameslangdon
